snippet: The State Department of Corrections said it was seeking an outside investigator to conduct an independent inquiry into the execution of Joseph R. Wood III.
abstract: Lawyers for Joseph R Wood III, Arizona inmate executed by lethal injection in July, say he was given 15 times the standard dose of a sedative and a painkiller during a procedure that lasted nearly two hours; Arizona Department of Corrections announces plans to conduct an independent inquiry into Wood’s execution; troubled execution prompted Arizona's attorney general to order temporary halt to executions in state.
lead_paragraph: The State Department of Corrections said it was seeking an outside investigator to conduct an independent inquiry into the execution of Joseph R. Wood III.

headline.main: Executed Arizona Inmate Got 15 Times Standard Dose, Lawyers Say
headline.print_headline: Executed Arizona Inmate Got 15 Times Standard Dose, Lawyers Say
